text.text_translated: In old horror films, the main people were very scared. They could not call for help. They could not call the police. Now, mobile phones make this hard to believe. So, how can films keep people excited? The answer is: phones do not work! If you are a hero in a horror film, you will need to call for help. This happens at an important time. But your phone will almost certainly not work. Or your phone battery will die. This happens when you start to call. Sometimes, both things happen.
